name: circle jumper (FORE-SQUARE)
description:
you play as a circle and you need to make your way past floating platfoarms and end less hot boiling lava can lil-circle make it to the finish? or will he perish in the scorching lava? find out today by playing this game!

you need desktop scratch to play this game. or play it here:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/606065819/
